sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>true</before> <description>Fix script to update Operational status to "Non-Operational (2)" of those VMWare VMs whose Status (install_status) is "Retired (7)" but Operational status (operational_status) is still "Operational (1)"</description> <name>Update OS of Retired VMWare VMs</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideMultipleUpdate("cmdb_ci_vmware_instance"); gr.addQuery('install_status', '7'); gr.addQuery('operational_status', '1'); gr.setValue('operational_status', '2'); gr.execute(); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>now.discovery.content</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-29 12:07:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e480e422970bed90b2ee33671153af45</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update OS of Retired VMWare VMs</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Core Automation" source="com.snc.core.automation">6ca7f42c3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f6a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e480e422970bed90b2ee33671153af45</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>now.discovery.content</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-29 12:07:02</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
